mapper.insert: insert into mf_user(username, password, truename, lx, store_code, dept_code,storage_code) values(#{username},#{password},#{truename},#{lx},#{storeCode},#{deptCode},#{storageCode})
mapper.update: update mf_user set password=#{password} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select a.id,a.username,a.password,a.truename,a.lx, a.store_code as storeCode,d.store_name as storename, c.lxInfo,a.dept_code,e.dept_name, a.storage_code as storageCode,f.store_name as storageName from mf_user a left join mf_store d on a.store_code =d.store_code left join mf_user_lx c on a.lx=c.lx left join mf_region e on a.dept_code = e.dept_code left join mf_store f on a.storage_code = f.store_code
a.username like concat('%',#{key},'%') or a.truename like concat('%',#{key},'%')
order by id

select a.id,a.username,a.password,a.truename,a.lx, a.store_code as storeCode,d.store_name as storename, c.lxInfo,a.dept_code as deptcode,e.dept_name as deptname, a.storage_code as storageCode,f.store_name as storageName from mf_user a left join mf_store d on a.store_code =d.store_code left join mf_user_lx c on a.lx=c.lx left join mf_region e on a.dept_code = e.dept_code left join mf_store f on a.storage_code = f.store_code where a.username=#{username} and a.password=#{password}
select a.plbm,b.plmc from mf_user_pl a left join mf_pl b on a.plbm=b.plbm where a.uid=#{uid}

select a.id,a.username,a.password,a.truename,a.lx, a.store_code as storeCode,d.store_name as storename, c.lxInfo,a.dept_code as deptcode,e.dept_name as deptname, a.storage_code as storageCode,f.store_name as storageName from mf_user a left join mf_store d on a.store_code =d.store_code left join mf_user_lx c on a.lx=c.lx left join mf_region e on a.dept_code = e.dept_code left join mf_store f on a.storage_code = f.store_code where a.id=#{uid}
